Flip and Blast.name: Flip and Blast
Flip and Blast.flavor: Arcane force washes outward from you . . . but you aren’t there anymore.
Flip and Blast.effect: Before or after the attack, you can shift half your speed.
Flip and Blast.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier force damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to its next attack roll before the end of your next turn.

Set a Riddle.name: Set a Riddle
Set a Riddle.flavor: You confuse your opponent with quick words and a charming smile.
Set a Riddle.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Set a Riddle.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Revealing Feint.name: Revealing Feint
Revealing Feint.flavor: You fake left and dance right, taking away your attacker’s advantage.
Revealing Feint.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you do not grant combat advantage for any reason.
